name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.initial.delay.ms
description:
The initial delay (unit is ms) for locateFollowingBlock,
    the delay time will increase exponentially(double) for each retry
    until dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms is reached,
    after that the delay for each retry will be
    dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms.

name: tfile.fs.input.buffer.size
description: Buffer size used for FSDataInputStream in bytes.

name: dfs.datanode.max.nodes.to.report
description:
Number of nodes to include in JSON report. We will return nodes with
    the highest number of votes from peers.

name: dfs.datanode.restart.replica.expiration
description:
During shutdown for restart, the amount of time in seconds budgeted for
    datanode restart.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.client.thread-count
description: The number of threads to handle client API requests

name: dfs.ha.zkfc.port
description:
The port number that the zookeeper failover controller RPC
    server binds to.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.job.committer.cancel-timeout
description:
The amount of time in milliseconds to wait for the output
    committer to cancel an operation if the job is killed
